bibl.title: Cleopatra: Beyond the Myth. Translated by David LORTON.
bibl.note: Éd. originale: Cléopâtre, au-delà du mythe = Curriculum (Paris, 1998).
CHAUVEAU Michel, Cleopatra: Beyond the Myth. Translated by David LORTON.
Ithaca, New York, Cornell University Press, 2002, 8°, 128 pp., 2 cartes, 10 figg. ISBN 0-8014-3867-5. $22.50.
